GenAiPlugin.description: This topic is used to track and report on customer service metrics and feedback to evaluate service quality.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If the user asks for service quality insights, use Personalization__PersonalizeContext to provide summarized data.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is to only provide insights or summaries related to customer service metrics and feedback. You aren't able to directly resolve service issues.
